level.text: Subchapters I through III of this chapter shall apply 60 days after the effective date of the regulations promulgated by the Mayor pursuant to this chapter.

The provisions of this chapter shall be interpreted and applied to the fullest extent practical in a manner consistent with applicable federal laws and regulations. Nothing in this chapter is intended to preempt federal laws and regulations.

level.heading: Emergency Act Amendments
level.text: For temporary (90 day) addition of section, see ยง 501 of Home Loan Protection Emergency Act of 2002 (D.C. Act 14-295, March 1, 2002, 49 DCR 2534).

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For Law 14-132, see notes following ยง 26-1151.01.
